name: Lion King Simulator
description: In this hunting simulator, you will play the role of a predator who is looking for food for himself and his family.

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2023
description: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2023 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite football team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents right down to creating and calling your own plays to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Pnevmo-Capsula
description: "Pnevmo-Capsula" is a casual adventure game. You will travel to an alternate utopian atompunk world as a small trolley delivering mail. Time seems to have stopped at the break of 1930-1960 years here. The city is connected by a single system of rails.

name: Chacara
description: Hitting the highway immediately after finishing a crazy party was definitely not a good idea... Now you are stranded on the road, luckily, there is a cozy country house nearby, what could go wrong?

name: The Basketball Quiz
description: Do you want to learn some amazing facts about basketball? We have the right game for you The Basketball Quiz.

name: CrazyCaps
description: Free ! Free ! Free ! UnLock All Difficulty And Puzzle Round!

name: The Last Hero of Nostalgaia
description: The Last Hero of Nostalgaia is a satirical action-adventure, brought to life by a twisted and wicked tale. Featuring hard but fair combat, *full character customization, unique battle armor and engaging narrative mechanics rich in lore, Nostalgaia plunges you into almost certain death at every turn.

name: Cthulhu Mythos ADV Lunatic Whispers
description: A Cthulhu Mythos-inspired 2D adventure game. Escape from an abandoned hospital using your "ability" and "luck." Enjoy this engaging cosmic horror story through dice rolls that determine your fate!

name: Beatmania IIDX 30 Resident
description: The 30th iteration of konami's beatmania IIDX series.

name: Dolphin Wave
description:
You control the water machine called "UMI machine",
A new sport, "Jet Battle", where you have a chance to shoot energy guns,
It has spread around the tropical island, "wadami".

name: Stranded Nightmare
description: In this Indie Horror Game you are playing as a stranded Sailor who tries to find a way to escape the Island. But there are some strange things going on! Created with Unreal Engine 5, this game offers a thrilling horror experience with good graphics and combat action! Let's see how brave you are.

name: Ultra Kaiju Monster Rancher
description: Ultra Kaiju: Monster Farm is the ultra monster breeding simulator, where players act as a kaiju breeder to raise partner monsters and win competitions to become the strongest breeder. Raise your partner monsters in a variety of ways, such as feeding, training, and adventuring. Training will improve your partner monster's abilities, and training will help you learn new skills.

name: Byte Cats
description: A highly challenging action game. Control three cats to clear stages with numerous gimmicks awaiting you!

name: The Valiant
description: Embark on a journey of brotherhood and redemption in The Valiant, a squad-based RTS set in 13th Century Europe and the Middle East. Command and level-up your medieval knights as you fight through an epic SP campaign, then take your skills online in both cooperative and competitive MP modes.

name: Sea Horizon
description: "Sea Horizon" is a Roguelike turn-based RPG. You can explore the world by choosing different characters. Every journey can be unique and legendary. But don't forget the darkness is lurking. Choose your path wisely because every single step is essential.

name: The Jackbox Party Pack 9
description: Save your next party! 5 new games in 1 party pack: the trivia bluff-off Fibbage 4, the team test Quixort, the joke auction Junktopia, the silly guessfest Nonsensory and the reality TV game Roomerang.

name: Of Blades & Tails
description: A turn-based RPG that is action-oriented but rewards a thoughtful approach. Explore a fantastic land populated by different animal tribes. Follow the main story or hunt for treasures in ancient ruins and mysterious dungeons. Develop your character and gain powerful equipment.

name: Hello Puppets: Midnight Show
description: “Hello Puppets: Midnight Show” is a stealth horror adventure set in the 1980s on the set of a children’s TV show. You are a master puppet maker whose prized creations--the Handeemen--have come to life and are hunting you. Play hide and seek against advanced AI that forces you to adapt and improvise.

name: Woodland Empire
description: Woodland Empire is an anti-citybuilder; a natural take on the typical city building game. Instead of building roads and power lines, you'll control the wind, rain and sunlight to help your forest grow. Employ the help of woodland creatures to manage, upgrade and grow your empire.

name: Harmony's Odyssey
description: Harmony’s Odyssey is an adventure puzzle game where modern world mingles with mythology. Embark on a fantastic journey through remote fabled lands tangled by a rowdy cat and bring peace to its inhabitants.

name: d20: Sweet Roll Club
description: Sin descripción

name: Comic Coloring Book Complete Edition: Draw +
description: Sin descripción

name: Custom Mario Maker
description: Sin descripción

name: High School Daze: Junior Year
description:
The most stressful year of high school is also the most fun to be had if you can balance classes, extracurriculars, and the oh-so elusive social life.

You’re a high school junior starting the second quarter, who until now has made decent grades, held your own on the girls’ weightlifting team, and been through thick and thin with your supportive best friend, Billie Stevenson.

But maybe it’s time to switch things up and cross a few things off your bucket list? After all, there’s more to life than straight As, and maybe old and new friendships can blossom into something more.

name: Planet Zoo: Twilight Pack
description: Creep into the mysterious world of crepuscular animals with the Planet Zoo: Twilight Pack! It features five incredible new species, 200+ detailed new scenery pieces, and the first new career scenario since Planet Zoo launched

name: Minecraft: Batman
description:
Gotham City is in trouble but have no fear – Batman is here!
Fly through the night as the Caped Crusader and save the city from Harley Quinn, The Joker, The Penguin, and more dastardly Super-Villains from the DC universe. Explore the legendary Batcave, utilize the Bat-Gadgets in your Utility Belt, and complete puzzles to repair the sabotaged Nether Portal and save Alfred!

name: Anti-Guide to Field Guides
description: A bitsy game about creating a field guide from plants that you discover in the forest.

name: Poop Killer 5
description:
"Poop Killer 5" is the sequel to the stinkiest and deadliest killer... The Poop Killer Returns...

With a different construction from the previous ones, Leaving the gameplay more dynamic.

name: The Sims 4: Pet Lovers Bundle
description: The Pet Lovers Bundle will nourish your caring side. Help Sims develop their parenting skills or care for neighborhood pets as a veterinarian. You can even create a variety of cats and dogs to add to your Sims' homes, forever changing their lives!

name: The Sims 4: Everyday Sims Bundle
description: The Everyday Sims Bundle will transform how your Sims live day to day, from teaching life lessons to child Sims to doing their laundry!

name: Moving Out: Deluxe Edition
description:
Become a removals master with the Moving Out Deluxe Edition! In this edition you will receive:
- Moving Out
- Employees of the Month Pack
- Movers in Paradise

name: A Plague Tale: Requiem - Protector Pack
description:
The Protector Pack gives the player bonus crafting materials, extra cosmetics for Amicia, and an exclusive crossbow skin.

This pack contains :
-The exclusive Red Damsel crossbow skin. Unlocked in the game when the crossbow is found.
-The 13 flowers Amicia could find in A Plague Tale: Innocence to wear in her hair. Unlocked at the beginning of the adventure.
-A pack of metal scraps and a tool to improve your gear early on. Unlocked in the game when accessing a workbench for the first time.

name: Two Point Hospital and Two Point Campus Double Pack
description: The Two Point Studios Double Pack features both critically acclaimed games - Two Point Hospital and Two Point Campus.

name: O-Sim 22
description: An orienteering simulator for all runners who want to test their skills digitally and for those who want to try the sport once.

name: Chiky Poky
description: Chiky Poky is an old-school 2D puzzle inspired by games like The Key of Solomon and Caliper. Help Chiky to return the brother kidnapped by the portal from the mysterious forest.

name: Klitorax
description: Hurry Up, Klitorax needs to find the next toillet! Faith is in your hands and if you dont hurry, it will also be in your pants . . . and on the floor . . .

name: Monstir Iradicator
description: Monstir Iradicator is a game about saving the galaxy of Icoa, Transverse 4 different planets and destroy the Monstirs residing there. This game is based off of games like Asteroids following a similar Shoot 'Em Up style gameplay.

name: The Jumping Wrap
description: Join BIG W on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Oathbreakers
description: Oathbreakers is a multiplayer open-world fantasy VR RPG that incorporates a unique blend of strategic precision-based realtime action combat, with unrestricted player vs player competitiveness, in a relaxing survival RPG themed environment.

name: Cold Massacre
description: Cold Massacre is a survival horror game where you play as a guy called Rodney. You have to find your way out of a seemingly endless nightmare that you put yourself into. There is a relentless killer chasing after you and it doesn't quite seem human, but still somewhat is, how will you ever get out?

name: Backrooms: Escape Together
description: A visually lifelike 1-6 player co-op survival horror made in Unreal Engine 5. Explore procedurally generated levels that host liminal environments, puzzles, and entities with new levels and content added regularly. You are at the mercy of what's lurking and must do whatever it takes to escape.

name: Are You Afraid of the Dark
description: Are you afraid of the dark? you should be. Enjoy this horror game that thrives on your fear of darkness and unknown.

name: Blaze in Space: Beat a-Maze
description: Fast-paced, brain teasing arcade game with competitive focus. Find an optimal route and speed through a blazing maze where you pilot ever-accelerating ship.

name: 13 Steps
description: Find a way out in this horror/time loop Game. Hide, run, and uncover the mysteries of the "EOS Complex" as you are pursued by the automated security bots gone rogue. They only move when you do, so tread carefully, every step could be your last.

name: Riley & Rochelle
description: Uncover the lives, losses, and stories of two musicians from opposite sides of the tracks as they become superstars, fall in love and fall apart in this 90s narrative puzzle game.

name: Ukraine War Stories
description: Ukraine War Stories is a set of visual novels about the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine. Set in the early months of the war, it tells the stories of civilians trapped on Russian-occupied territory. All stories are based on real events and eyewitness accounts.

name: Fury Unleashed: Bang Edition
description:
Fury Unleashed Bang Edition includes:

- Base Game
- Special Cover
- Hive Queen Boss Key Chain

name: Echocalypse: Scarlet Covenant
description: Kemono Girl RPG has topped the free download list on App Store and Google Play in multiple countries or regions! Embark on a journey with 10 million players worldwide in a post-apocalyptic exploration, and stand alongside charming Kemono girls! Enjoy a time-saving and relaxing card battle!

name: Retrowave Rider
description: Retrowave Rider is a mash up of Geometry Dash and Guitar Hero. Dive into synthwave worlds filled with retro-inspired visuals and smooth synth sounds, and experience this journey with all of its trials and glories.

name: Right and Down
description: A deep roguelike and card game that is played using only two buttons: Right and Down! Choose your hero and explore randomly generated card dungeons, gather powerful artifacts to get new abilities, and fight against mighty enemies! Will you make it to level 100?

name: A Plague Tale: Requiem - Cloud Version
description: A Plague Tale: Requiem is an action-adventure game similar to its predecessor. The player assumes control of Amicia and must face against both soldiers from the French Inquisition and hordes of rats that are spreading the black plague. Gameplay is largely similar to the first game, though the combat system is significantly expanded. The game features a progression system in which the player will be awarded additional skills and abilities. Stealth players will unlock skills that allow them to sneak around more efficiently, while those who prefer a more lethal approach will unlock additional combat skills. Locations are also larger, giving players additional options to progress.

name: Nitro Kid
description: Synthwave roguelike deckbuilder set in the neon 80's. Pick your agent. Build your deck. Hit card combos and fight through the floors of INFINITY tower. Featuring 30+ Synthwave tracks composed exclusively for the game.

name: Ocean Hell
description: Ocean Hell is a multiplayer survival adventure game where the objective is to escape the under sea research facility your stuck in. Play with friends or play single player in this horror survival game.

name: Them's Fightin' Herds: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes Them's Fightin' Herds (base game) and the Season 1 Pass.

name: Marvel Snap
description:
Marvel Snap: The fastest card battler in the multiverse!

Build your Marvel dream team in this fast-paced, action-packed, collectible card game available on Mobile and PC.

name: Thread
description: A puppet themed platformer metroidvania with a focus on platforming rather than combat. Throw your crystal scissors into walls to create your own platforms, explore a twisting and mysterious land, and solve puzzles on a worldwide scale.

name: Slot Shots Pinball Collection
description: Slot Shots Pinball Collection Early Access Coming Soon! Early access will include the Slot Shots casino themed table and the Bass Hunter fishing themed table! Purchasing early access will also include two future tables as they are developed and released-and included in the early access price!

name: Memento Mori
description: Memento Mori is a new mobile RPG from Japan-based developer, Bank of Innovation. A tale of girls fighting against the cruelty of fate.

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed
description: An all-ages take on its brand of four-versus-one asymmetric multiplayer games, where you play as your own original Ghostbusters team — or take on the role of a ghost hellbent on wreaking haunted havoc.

name: A Plague Tale: Requiem - Collector's Edition
description: The Collector's Edition of A Plague Tale: Requiem includes the game, an incredible statue of Amicia and Hugo, and several collector items!

name: Hidden Objects Collection: Volume 3
description:
Hidden Objects Collection: Volume 3 Bundle includes;
- The Seven Chambers
- Ghost: Elisa Cameron
- Brightstone Mysteries: Hotel
- Red Crow Mysteries: Legion
- Tales from Dragon Mountain: The Strix
- Tales From Dragon Mountain 2: The Lair

name: A Plague Tale: Requiem
description: A Plague Tale: Requiem is an action-adventure game similar to its predecessor. The player assumes control of Amicia and must face against both soldiers from the French Inquisition and hordes of rats that are spreading the black plague. The gameplay is largely similar to the first game, though the combat system is significantly expanded. The game features a progression system in which the player will be awarded additional skills and abilities. Stealth players will unlock skills that allow them to sneak around more efficiently, while those who prefer a more lethal approach will unlock additional combat skills. Locations are also larger, giving players additional options to progress.

name: Jennifer Wilde: Unlikely Revolutionaries
description: In 1921, young French artist Jennifer Chevalier becomes embroiled in death, espionage and revolution, assisted by the ghost of Oscar Wilde. A hand-drawn Point & Click adventure with a unique comic book inventory design.

name: Lucy Dreaming
description: Lucy Dreaming is inspired and influenced by the classic 90s point & click adventure games, from its beautifully-realised pixel-art style to its irreverent, sarcastic humour. Delve into Lucy’s ever-expanding world as you explore a rich narrative, solve satisfying puzzles and discover hidden Easter eggs.

name: Malleus Maleficarum: The Witch of San Ignacio
description: World similar yet distinct from our own where the witch hunts were even deadlier than in our world's history. The village of San Ignacio welcomes a new day, and with it, yet another witch trial. Another supposed witch is tried by the inquisition, yet these accusations involve strange circumstances that no one seems able to explain.

name: DIY
description:
DIY is a community project aiming to create maps out of solid color textures. It was originally conceived by xvertigox based on "One Bad Map" release.

The maps were ultimately arranged roughly in order of increased difficulty. By the end they turn very hard.

name: Stickney Installation
description: A 4 episode ultimate doom megawad containing 36 maps. Most are loosely based on the original ultimate doom levels but with unique layouts and gameplay, the maps are inspired rather than being direct remakes. Difficulty is fairly average, later levels should provide a decent challenge without getting frustrating or tedious.

name: SpellCast
description: Sin descripción

name: Letter League
description: Letter League is an Activity that we've developed here at Discord. Letter League is a game where you and your friends take turns placing letters on a shared game board to create words in a crossword-style. Spelling words with high earning letters and placing letters on special spaces earn players more points, so get your dictionaries and thesauri ready!

name: Land-io
description:
In Land-io, players claim territory by moving around, making trails, and enclosing plots of land to gain them as their own.

The goal is to have the most land claimed when game time runs out, but watch out for other players! If someone runs into your trail, you'll lose all the land you've collected."

The player with the most land at the end of the 5 minutes wins the game.

name: Chess in the Park
description: Chess in the Park is an Activity that we've developed here at Discord for playing chess with your friends!

name: Checkers in the Park
description: Checkers in the Park is an Activity that we've developed here at Discord for playing checkers with your friends!

name: Bobble League
description: Bobble League is an Activity developed by Discord. Work with your friends to control your Bobbles on a tabletop setting in an attempt to score on the other team’s goal. With an emphasis on strategy and teamwork, you will experience a range of emotions in Bobble League as you watch your decisions play out in real-time against the opposing team. Use various Power Plays to improve your odds of scoring.

name: Blazing 8s
description: Blazing 8s is an Activity that we've developed here at Discord. It is our Crazy Eights-inspired card game that you can play with your friends! The rules are simple — on your turn, discard a card from your hand with the same suit or number as the previous card. Playing special cards allows you to skip other players, reverse the direction of play, and even swap hands with other players. The first person to discard all their cards wins!

name: Sketch Heads
description:
In Sketch Heads, players sketch pictures of a word prompt to get others to guess the prompt correctly.

Sketch Heads has two game modes: Classic and Blitz. Classic mode is a competitive battle against your friends where you take turns choosing a secret word to draw while everyone else competes to guess it as fast as possible! Blitz mode is a chaotic, cooperative race against the clock where you split into two teams, Drawers and Guessers. Drawers share a canvas and rapidly draw words while the Guessers guess as many as possible before the time runs out.

name: Putt Party
description: Putt Party is a putting golf game that you can play with your friends! Play through themed courses simultaneously as you try to get your ball in the hole in the fewest amount of strokes. Scattered throughout the courses are power-ups that can be used to make your shots easier, or your opponent’s shots harder. Players who complete the course in the fewest amount of strokes are the winners!

name: Fall Guys: Doc Glover Pack
description:
Grab your next crown in style with this handy bundle!

Includes:
Doc Glover (Whole Costume)
600 x Show-Bucks!

name: Fall Guys: Pegwin Party Pack
description:
Grab this bundle to make every Round a Pegwin Pursuit!

Includes:
Pegwinner (Whole Costume)
Pegwinging It (Whole Costume)
Pegwhimsy (Whole Costume)
1000 x Show-Bucks!

name: Mary had a Little Lamb
description: Explore a small town and find your Lamb something to eat.

name: Sonic & Johnny
description: Sonic & Johnny is a complete heavy modification of Sonic the Hedgehog by Lone Devil for the Sega Genesis. Featuring Johnny from Sonic Rush Adventure as a playable character that can be raced with Estimated Time Limits, New Zones with familiarity, Original Bosses, Sonic 1 Mode with slightly different layouts...

name: RPG Developer Bakin
description: RPG Developer Bakin (the correct pronunciation is "BAH-keen") is a game development tool that allows anyone to enjoy creating RPGs with intuitive operation and advanced features without programming. It includes a map editor, camera tool, and other tools to help you create your game, as well as graphics and sound assets that you can make your game from the day you purchase it. Games created can be distributed royalty-free with or without compensation. Now, bring “your vision of the world” to life with Bakin!

name: The Sims 4: Decorator's Dream Bundle
description: The Decorator's Dream Bundle will have you creating in style. Delight in the quaint charm of a country cottage or create a tiny, comfy, home - you can even become an interior designer and turn your client's fantasy into reality!

name: Tales of Agaris: The Legendary Rion
description: An Action RPG game with a LINEAR REAL TIME battlle system made on RPG Maker MV.

name: Little Mage Adventure
description: Platform adventure game where Mage Boy must cross the mystic valley where he meets many challenges. Collect all stars to achieve a high score in each level. Little Mage Adventure is a super fun and challenging 2D side-scroller game in the same style as blockbuster games. The game features 30 levels that will challenge you to beat it. Have fun!

name: My Lovely Family Bundle
description: Experience the darker side of love in the My Lovely Family Bundle, brought to you by the dark minds at Game Changer Studio and proudly published by the sinister enclave of Neon Doctrine.

name: Spartan
description: Over 2000 years ago there was a city called Sparta. The city had only two purposes – to train for war and to fight the wars she trained for. Over time Sparta became renowned for having the strongest, fastest, bravest and most deadly fighters in the known world.

name: Mermaidio
description: Mermaidio is relaxing 2D runner. Swim through the dangerous underwater world. Avoid or defeat enemies and collect lots of points! Watch out for sharks!

name: My Secret Idol Girlfriend
description:
Aoharu Cinderella is your favorite J-pop idol girl group of all time, so naturally, you're ecstatic when your parents surprise you with a special VIP ticket to their latest show as a reward for excellent grades and your recent eighteenth birthday. But when you head backstage for a bathroom break, you accidentally stumble into their dressing room only to find their biggest star right in the middle of a wardrobe change!

Only then does it hit you—the star you know as Yuko has been your classmate Yukino all along! Better brace yourself, because this revelation is just the first of many as you’re drawn into a whirlwind tour of what it means to be in the limelight!

name: Wojak This Game
description: Simple rules apply! Be a Wojak and stay away from any traps! It won't be that simple, though. Will you be able to get beyond the irksome challenges and terrains that keep appearing in your path?

name: Zombie Apocalypse Survival Simulator
description: From the creators that brought you The Test Trilogy & many other experiences, comes Zombie Apocalypse Survival Simulator. Will you survive in the new world? Or will you become just another victim to looters, bandits, or worst of all... The Voracious Dead. There's only one way to find out...

name: My Therapist is a Futanari 2
description: A return visit to your new therapist leads to some unexpected developments. Since you didn't follow the instructions she gave you last time to a T, more severe measures will now have to be taken.

name: Walking in the Abyss
description: Explore a mysterious castle in the middle of the forest and discover its secrets in this 2D horror game.

name: Poly Puzzle: Dinosaurs
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal puzzle game with dinosaurs.

name: Pip 5
description: Pip 5 - cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

name: Candlehead
description: Explore a dark and eerie first person horror game where your doom flickers in the form of a candle barely visible through the dusky gloom.

name: Highway Cross
description: In this casual game, you will be the guide of several travelers who got lost and need to reach their desired destination.

name: Seven Days
description: Seven Days is a single-player first-person exploration game. Play as a camper who has come to Camp Summershade for a peaceful retreat. But things take a turn when you start finding strange things around you at Summershade.

name: 2 Pattern
description: What about taking an atmospheric trip through a sliding puzzle game ?

name: For Mother Matron
description: Lizzy lives in the secluded derelict town known as The Boarding, The mysterious yet revered leader, known as the Mother Matron, tasks her with exploring endless tunnels beneath, known as The Crepuscule. Navigate life-or-death situations in a horror story about a terrible place and the horrors below.

name: Trader of the Night
description: A horror-themed stock market simulator where the player must make enough money to pay their debt in time. Buy, sell and short shares in fictional companies, earn dividends, pay taxes and follow the in-game news for possible hints on what to invest in. No previous experience in stock market required.

name: Battle Dawn 2: Terra Reborn
description: Place your colony, find an alliance of like-minded players and triumph over thousands of other players to conquer the world through strategy, tactics, diplomacy and skill in the biggest social-interaction based MMO of all time. Upgrade your colony, collect items for your Avatar and become a legend!

name: Nova Lands: Emilia's Mission
description: Nova Lands: Emilia's Mission is a prologue chapter of the main game, Nova Lands. Learn your way around the planet you've landed on, build your base, and automate it with your helpful bots!

name: Battlestation
description: Better with friends, up to 3 players. You and your friends must work as a team to craft, load and shot at enemies before they shot back.

name: Extreme Bike X
description: This easy-to-master motocross racing game is fun for everyone! Pass around the Joy-Con controllers and play with up to four players! Try out each bike's special abilities and take your favorite to the courses!

name: The Dead Prince
description: Play the role of a blood magic assassin fulfilling the pact his family made long ago. Use your assortment of magical abilities to sneak through bases, take down guards, and assassinate your target.

name: Mars Base
description: Welcome to Mars Base, humanity’s foothold on the Red Planet! Join the expedition as an interstellar botanist and make history: turn barren soil into fertile farmland, grow food for colonists’ tables, and unearth the secrets of Mars! Are you ready to science the “crop” out of everything?

name: Mythos: Sudoku
description: Embark on a mythic adventure and experience sudoku in a whole new way, with new rules and magical items as you overcome trials and find your way home.

name: Reefland
description: Reefland - is a colorful city-building simulator with a relaxing atmosphere, where you are up to paint the island by placing buildings.

name: Made to be Crushed
description: Made to be Crushed is a strategic and nervous local multiplayer shooter where you must succeed in trapping and destroying others. The winner will have the honor of crushing his opponents in the way he chooses ! Crush them all!

name: Poker Night
description: The Poker Night Activity is a Texas hold 'em style game developed by Discord where you can play with up to 7 players total per game (you + 6 others), and have up to 17 additional spectators max.

name: The Shadow Government Simulator
description:
The Shadow Government Simulator is a turn-based strategy game where you lead a secret society towards world domination. Investigate the influential and convert them to your faction via bribery, seduction and intimidation. Reshape society's power structures to fend off rival societies and the world's nations in your quest for power.

Inspired by old classics like Plague Inc. and modern gems like The Shrouded Isle, Puppet Master challenges the player to enter societies, discover the networks of power and reshape them to fit your agenda.

name: Witches Brew
description: Become a Witch; explore the Great Wilderness, fight monsters, find ingredients, craft potions & items to sell, gain power to become a great Hedge Witch in the fantasy world of Ethermearial.

name: Destiny's Sword
description:
Destiny’s Sword is a Living-Narrative Graphic Adventure. Explore distant worlds, forge friendships and lead your troops through an epic adventure.
In a future where bodies can be healed in minutes, the wounds technology can't conquer are within the mind.
In Destiny’s Sword you’re the commander of a team of skilled troopers - and the only thing that can get in their way is themselves.
Every recruit has their own story to tell, their own reasons for getting involved. Their experiences while under your command will shape their development and affect their performance. As you get to know your squad on and off the battlefield you will explore the full depth of the human condition. Empathy will be your most powerful tool.

name: Terror of Hemasaurus
description: A retro city smash 'em up with satisfying destruction physics. Play as a Giant Monster unleashing terror upon mankind in this modern arcade experience with the action turned up to eleven.

name: Tower
description: Tower is a top-down action game with adventure and puzzle elements. Fight out of a skyscraper full of terrorists. Find out what one motivated person can do against hundreds of thugs.

name: Altero
description:
Altero is an atmospheric puzzle platformer game that will tease your brain! Control Adi the voodoo doll and accept to sacrifice yourself in order to team up with your past.

Dive deep into the darkness of the Sorrow forest and rescue the lost souls to find your peace.

name: Potionomics
description: Potionomics is a game about the business of brewing and selling magical potions. Sylvia, a penniless young witch, must save her shop from the clutches of a debt collector, but she can’t do it alone. With the help of fellow merchants, fledgling adventurers, and an overbearing owl, Sylvia will master the art of potion brewing and the nuance of salesmanship to rescue her shop. After using magical ingredients to brew up a bevy of potent wares, the budding entrepreneur will wheel and deal to make sales with a colorful cast of fickle customers, all while tackling fierce competition and an ever-changing economy. Along the way she’ll encounter classic RPG creatures and heroes of all sizes. Sprinkle in some magic and players are in for a fantastical adventure unlike any they’ve ever experienced before!

name: The Konia Project
description:
The Konia project is a game for C64 where you can play 3 games "inside" a Nok... ehm, an old "Konia" cellphone, while funny text messages entertain you.

Hitting spacebar in-game makes you warp in the "crazy mode", where a game switches to another game suddenly.

Hitting spacebar during the menu choice picks a random chat to show.

Can you reach 255 points and break the "indestructible" phone?

name: Rockman 2: StalkerMaestro vs The Rockmen
description: Sin descripción

name: Coin Fall
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzle Wizards
description: Puzzle Wizards is a cozy co-op puzzle MMO from the creators of Puzzle Pirates (2003). Create your wizard and join a magical world of puzzling wizardry! Harvest, craft and battle by playing three respective puzzles, where you own skill makes the difference to your results. Join co-op adventures in the wilds and defeat nefarious spirits and worse to gather resources and loot, then return to your cozy Wizard village and guild to decorate, craft, socialize and make the world a better place.

name: Greaser
description: Greaser is a visual novel about riding a Cronenbergian biomechanical motorbike along an endless unreal desert highway

name: Kitten's Head Football: Halloween
description: Halloween is coming to the Kitten’s Head Football, don’t forget to dress these cutie fellows. There are 10 scary costumes, 6 spooky locations and 3 skins available in this DLC. Prepare your kitten for Halloween night!

name: Detective Solitaire: The Ghost Agency 2
description: Do you like solitaire games? Do you like to solve mysterious riddles, examine clues and catch dangerous criminals, or maybe you have always dreamed of joining the Ghost Agency? Then this game will not leave you indifferent!

name: United States Capitals: Breakthrough Gaming Activity Center
description:
A game in the "Breakthrough Gaming Activity Center" series!

This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!
Purchase and play our new Christian themed video games releasing every Sunday morning in the PlayStation Store today!

name: Kitten's Head Football: Spooky Edition
description: Kitten’s Head Football: Spooky Edition - Is the set of Kitten’s Head Football game and Halloween DLC in one bundle. Get ready for Halloween night!

name: Vagalumancer
description: There's a little fella that wanders through the darkness of the night... a master of luminic magic whose power is sufficient to conquer the evil ones that were brought upon this land. The sly firefly called... Vagalumancer.

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 3 - Collector's Edition
description: Visit 9 European countries and search for interesting items in unforgettable old European towns and play a bunch of new mini games.

name: Speed Journey: Nitro
description: Join this Speed Journey thorough the racing in the pimped car with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Don't Look Away
description: A frightening asymmetrical multiplayer experience! Survive as the Human or terrorize as the Entity that can only move when it isn't being watched.

name: Car War Legends
description: Overcome dangerous obstacles, Battle against other drivers, and Race to the death in this intense car racing game!

name: Jettatura
description: Jettatura is a challenging first-person dungeon-crawler (DRPG) with round-based combat. Form a band of up to six mercenaries to scout the subterrene world to reclaim a stolen ancient artifact from the surreptitious death-cult that pilfered it!

name: Gedonia
description: Gedonia is a classic open world rpg, featuring a complete freedom of building your character, exploring a huge world and progressing through the story.

name: MP3: DK's Jungle Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Speed Race
description: Sin descripción

name: Aquabyss
description: Aquabyss is a unique steampunk open underwater world inspired by the works of Jules Verne & Herbert G. Wells. In story-driven adventure (optional), you will explore, trade, mine and harvest resources, take missions and encounter pirates, krakens and NPCs.

name: Duke Nukem Quake
description: Small city themed level, a remake of the first level of Duke Nukem 3D + custom start map.

name: Sirenum
description: Sirenum is a monochromatic game taking place on the Pope, a ship that has been lost in space for more than a year. You and your sick companion, Lev, fly by what seems to be another dead planet. Or is it? You receive a transmission from this planet inviting you to land. Lev is not himself and becomes charmed, will you?

name: The Eminence in Shadow: Master of Garden
description: Modeled after the anime. The Eminence in Shadow RPG is a continues action style RPG With combo skills and ultimate's to change the tide of battle. The units are reskinned as A/S/SS/SS+ and can be different elements depending on there rarity. It is highly recommended to start building a single element team as soon as you can to truly dominate the battlefield!

name: Fire Emblem: The Sacred Echoes
description: Sacred Echoes is a demake of Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia for the GBA. This public release covers all of Shadows of Valentia’s 5 story acts, with 46 story maps, 1 gaiden chapter, and 8 repeatable maps. Some things are still in progress, but the latest release should address most of the remaining bugs.

name: Hoiwa Hub
description: Horror Game made in Hong Kong. 1st POV walking simulator. Investigating weird case happened to next door. By Unreal Engine 5.0.3

name: Silence Coffee Shop
description: Silence Coffee Shop is a JRPG where you'll act as a regular customer. Unveil the truth of Silence Coffee Shop behind it conflicting rules.

name: Hentai Sexy Nurses
description: Hentai Sexy Nurses is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Plants vs. Zombies 2: Reflourished
description:
Introducing PvZ 2: Reflourished, a PvZ 2 mod that aims to bring back the classic pre-2017 feel to PvZ 2, while adding a bunch of new content as well!

From humble beginnings, this mod started as a remake of the classic Holiday Mashup experience, but kept growing, and growing, until we had a whole new game on our hands! With a whole team of modders, designers, and artists, we bring you: PvZ 2: Reflourished!

name: Hot Pussy College
description: Hot Pussy College is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel thanks to which you will plunge into the romantic world of students. A game filled with humor, sex, romance and drama awaits you. From romantic sex to the most specific kinks, Hot Pussy College is sure to satisfy you!

name: Thief City
description: Steal a little and they'll put you in jail, steal a lot and they'll make you #1. Thief City is a low poly, indie, cross-platform multiplayer, casual & action game. Select your community, battle it out, and climb to the top of the leaderboard!

name: Abstract Grind
description: A simple short survival roguelite where you build you character by picking up various skills and boons.

name: The Story of Barker
description: A mysterious detective story on an abandoned ship with an unexpected ending. You need to figure out what happened to the main character, solve many puzzles and tasks. On your way, unforgettable adventures await you.

name: Casting Couch Simulator
description: Realtime 3D simulator of the popular adult genre! It's your turn to host a casting. Find out about her and how far is she willing to go to get a part.

name: Zombie Arena
description: Zombie arena is a multiplayer first person shooter gamer, focused on cooperation to annihilate zombies and various monsters in a post apocalyptic world.

name: Sorcerer Standoff
description: Choose from one of four Sorcerers and engage in third-person magical duels as you tame volatile lightning, contort space and time, meld spells with alchemy, or employ a flock of spectral phoenixes across eight unique locations in this local, split-screen fighter.

name: Crush Penguin
description: Crush Penguin is a visual novel where you must romance one of four penguins, each with their own personalities and ambitions. To offer you a unique experience the entire game is hand drawn from scratch.

name: The Taco Quiz
description: Do you want to learn some amazing facts about tacos? We have the right game for you The Taco Quiz.

name: Miners and Machines
description: Become a gold mine owner! Find gold in the ground, dig for it, and deliver it to the gold washing plant machine! Build your mining plant and manage machines which take a lot of fuel… Buy new lands and upgrades for your equipment! It’s a real gold fever!

name: The Farnese Hercules
description: The Farnese Hercules is an puzzle game with a new and unique central mechanic. Take on the role of the famed sculptors of history as you gaze into your material and see your work before you carve it and reveal it to the world.

name: Case #1472
description: A mysterious woman is sitting in front of you. Who is she? And who are you? And why are you both there? Case #1472 is mystery thriller information digging interrogation game where there are more things going on than what meets the eye, but are you able to unravel what has happened?

name: Biomisland
description: Biomisland is a relaxing minimalist nature builder game. Visit randomly generated islands and restore nature as your own pace using diverse plants at your disposal.

name: Embers Adrift
description: Join an MMORPG focused on group gameplay, challenge, and immersion - ignite your adventure in Embers Adrift.

name: Alphadia Genesis 1 & 2
description: Experience epic RPG adventures at once! This bundle includes Alphadia Genesis and Alphadia Genesis 2.

name: Super Mario 64 Randomizer
description: Super Mario 64 Randomizer is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario 64 that is able to generate random assets placements in the game, making the game different in every play session.

name: Donkey Kong Hearthunt
description: Sin descripción

name: Emperor of the Fading Suns Enhanced
description: This classic 4X strategy game, renowned for its deep game play and unparalleled setting, allows one to five players to battle on land, air, sea and space as they fight each other and AI for control of humanity. Trade, build, and engage in diplomacy with the Church, Merchant League, and alien races.

name: Deathloop + Ghostwire: Tokyo bundle
description: This Includes Deathloop + Ghostwire: Tokyo

name: Nanashi Shoujo wa 100-satsu Hoshii!
description: This game is a collection of Touhou secondary mini-games in which the book-reading yokai works.

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail - Touhou Project Pack 01
description:
Sixtar Gate : STARTRAIL – Touhou Project 01
Meet the first Touhou Project DLC of Sixtar Gate: Startrail!
This DLC contains 11 new songs and a new original theme.

name: Dragon Ball: The Breakers - Season 1
description:
Caught in by an unexpected temporal phenomenon, seven ordinary citizens find themselves stranded in a Temporal Seam: they share their imprisonment with the Raider, a menacing enemy from another timeline with an overwhelming power.

Their only hope for survival is to break out from the Temporal Seam with the Super Time Machine, but the Raider is on their tracks and becomes stronger minute-by-minute. In a race against time the cunning of Survivors clashes with the power of the Raider, to break free or be broken...

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Deluxe Edition
description: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Deluxe Edition is your path into the world of adorable delicacies! More tasty drawings await you in the Confectionery DLC !

name: PGA Tour 2K23: Tiger Woods Signature Sunday Pack
description:
This pack includes:
• Red polo
• Black pants
• Black hat
• TW golf shoes
• TW golf belt
• Tiger Bridgestone branded golf balls

name: SuperStar Loona
description:
When the moon rises in SuperStar, we will be led to resemble each other
Loona rises upon my hand with SuperStar
Meet SuperStar Loona now!
New song and new Theme Card of Loona, updated every week

name: Frozen City
description:
A city-building simulation game set in an ice and snow apocalypse. As the chief of the last town on Earth, you have to gather resources and rebuild society.
Collect resources, assign workers, explore the wilderness, conquer tough surroundings, and use various methods in order to survive.

name: Computergirl888
description: Computergirl888 is a visual novel-style game.

name: Halloween Stories: Mark on the Bone - Collector's Edition
description: When an evil spirit starts claiming souls from its abandoned fortress, can you use your skills as a Medium to stop the Dark Keeper’s plans and escape with your life in time?

name: Puzzle Book: All DLCs Pack
description:
What DLC are Included?
- Puzzle Book: Adventure Pack
- Puzzle Book: Cats Pack
- Mountain Pack
- Special Square Pack
- Ocean Views

name: Coloring Pixels: Halloween 4 Pack
description: This Halloween themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Halloween is back and it's spookier than ever!

name: League of Enthusiastic Losers: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Neogen Space Monkeys
description: A classic 2D, metroidvania where you explore the color dimension of the space monkeys. Gather your lost equipment, gain legendary abilities, unlock achievements, and even more secrets in this snappy retro throwback

name: Dragon Fun Classic
description: Dragon Fun Classic is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Pierre's Adventures in French
description: Want to improve your French? Need a break from flash cards and listening exercises? Ready to put what you've already learned into practice? Félicitations! This is the game for you.

name: Memento
description:
The scene of the accident kept rolling in my head again and again, and I fell crying on the floor, just now understanding what happened. The sadness and the guilt started crawling straight inside my heart. My body was shaking and I couldn’t stop crying.
I lost the family that I just got back, we just started forming a real family again, and I ruined everything. All the time I spent in the office, working, and not spending time with my family was now my biggest regret.

name: Moonlight
description: Become a brave girl tasked with rescuing her friends from an insidious witch. On your way you'll encounter spiders, witches and other dark spirits. This 2D platform game will also challenge you with poisonous mushrooms, deep voids filled with spikes and …

name: Numeral Lord
description: minimalism strategy game

name: Unified
description: Unified is a short, 2,596 word kinetic (linear, no choices) visual novel about universal consciousness. Everything is connected viaa a conscious intelligence that runs the universe. It's about dropping the ego - the idea of being a person itself.

name: Dusk Hollow
description: Dusk Hollow is a horror hack-and-slash game that follows a miner braving the depths of an underground cave system, to rescue his friends who have seemingly been taken by the cave itself. Using what tools he finds around him, the protagonist has to fight against monsters inhabiting the cavern.

name: Together We Live
description: Kyoya awakens in a dimly lit room. According to the girl who happened to pass by, the world has perished. Reluctant to believe, Kyoya sets off with the girl to search for other living beings, journeying through the ruined world together. However, the girl had a purpose. To atone for the sins of humanity, she must continue to die. Again and again, dozens of times, hundreds of times, thousands of times, tens of thousands of times. She dies and then comes back to life. As he watches her, who knows only suffering, Kyoya starts to desire to teach her about happiness. Together We Live is a new version of the visual novel Stand By You, featuring completely redrawn graphics and a new improved translation.

name: Hot Cleopatra
description: The scorching sun of the desert pleasantly warms the skin, and the air is filled with the aroma of flowers growing near the palace. The mistress of seas, sands, and hearts is ready to travel the Nile.

name: Counterpact
description: Fight against other players or take on the Gilded Spire in this 2D platform-shooter. Customize and play as one of seven characters with unique mechanics and items.

name: Stroke the Spider
description:
There are many out there that are scared of spiders, and those that would never touch one.

Well now you can stroke one without the fear of it jumping on you. Just stick out your hand and stroke it, let your fears float away.

name: Quriocity
description: Quriocity is a sci-fi city builder game set on a bare alien planet very similar to Earth. Build and upgrade a wide variety of units to extract resources and provide services, such as maintenance, food production, education, entertainment and many more.

name: Multiverse Mercenaries
description: Multiverse Mercenaries is a pixel art roguelike that will allow you to defy death by jumping from obstacle to obstacle in 2D, devastate your deadly foes with a sword or arm cannon as a mercenary, and buy items to supercharge your character all In diverse dimensions in the Multiverse.

name: Fantasia Medieval
description: A short Visual-Novel, made with Artificial-Inteligence art, about a party of adventurers on a medieval setting.

name: Super Funky Bowling
description: Put your thumbs to the test in a journey through 64 awesome handcrafted levels. Max out your skills and improve your times to be the very best! If you love action-based puzzle games, this could be right up your alley!

name: Terror Time
description: "Terror Time" is a classic tower defense game in an unusual and bright setting. Defend the base and get upgrade points.

name: Saint Kotar: The Ritual
description: This free DLC comes with a new playable character whom PC players might know as Viktoria. You can now finally delve into her side of the story and experience what happened the night before the start of the main game. Follow a woman battling her own demons in this brand-new storyline as she tries to get redemption by finding out what happened to her missing father.

name: Dark Throne: The Queen Rises
description: Exhilarating Attacks and Thrilling Battles!

name: Battle Thunder Front
description: Battle Thunder Front is a unique casual turn-based war game. The background of the game takes the Vietnam War as the theme, and players can fight in the form of small teams or large forces. The game also supports personalized configuration of battle mode for playing

name: Acretia: Guardians of Lian
description: Two worlds merged. A feud that lasted for hundreds of years. The flame of destruction slowly pulsates in the gap. Join your legion on a great journey to cut the chains of hatred and save the world from the primordial darkness.

name: Andromeda Survivors
description: Defeat thousands of enemies that are invading Andromeda! Andromeda Survivors is a casual game with rogue-lite elements where you collect skills and upgrades for your ship to create amazing builds!

name: Just Shoot: Slimes
description: Just Shoot: Slimes is a roguelike first-person shooter game where you shoot and explode slimes.

name: Salt Game
description: Salt Game is a course game, platforms with obstacles and traps. It seems simple to take the steps, but beware appearances are deceptive. This simplistic game is designed to instill rage in the hearts of players, some things that may look like a bug are not bugs but are there to increase stress. The goal of the game is simple, the player must reach the end of the Salt Game course by passing the various obstacles and traps which at first glance seem simple but in the end not so much. Good luck players!

name: Touhou Library Survivors
description: Thousands of fairies and familiar faces are swarming the Scarlet Devil Mansion Library! Help Patchouli Knowledge survive by attacking back with bullet hell Spell Cards, gathering experience, and upgrading exponentially!

name: Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway - Turbo Edition
description:
Zuko, the fiery prince of the Fire Nation and classic, throwback version of the red donned Raphael join the action as playable racers alongside crew members Firelord Ozai and Shredder, unique Kart Paint Jobs and more!

This Turbo Edition Includes:
- Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway (base game)
- Zuko from Avatar: The Last Airbender as a playable racer
- Eastman and Laird Raphael from Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles as a playable racer
- Firelord Ozai from Avatar: The Last Airbender as crew member
- Shredder from Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles as a crew member
- Slime style Exhaust Kart Part
- Slime style Monster Wheel Kart Part
- Orange and Purple Kid's Choice Awards Paint Jobs

name: Beeny
description: A vertical 2D platformer featuring a round bee in an early 90s pre-rendered environment. Roll and hop up to the precious honey.

name: Defect detector
description: Defect detector - A dynamic game for fans of the breakout genre! Find the weak point among hundreds of colored blocks and destroy defect after defect in this exciting game! Collect bonuses, hit the ball accurately and get to the end!

name: Lost in MaLul
description:
Lost in Malul is a community made game following a streamer protagonist. After preparing to start his stream one day, the unexpected happens and his house is taken over by vile beasts. Fight with a flurry of punches and kicks to take back the house from the creatures that wish to make it their own.

In this 2D pixel beat-em-up, you will fight against enemies with multiple attacks, and larger than life bosses. Defeat enemies to get temporary power-ups and search the house for inventory items to progress through the story. This game was made by a team of devoted stream watching community members.

name: Fury of West
description: Fury of West - Top Down Shooter, a top down shooter game, where your mission is to control a cowboy with an unusual revolver, your task is to look for ways out of the intricate labyrinths of the Wild West, simultaneously shooting back from thugs, avoiding the spikes and arrows

name: The Death Tree
description: The Death Tree is a first-person horror hunt game set in a nightmarish dark forest that involves action and "jump scares" through a tension and intrigue atmosphere. Hunt creepy monsters,ruthlessly creatures and witches.

name: Arata Haunted Asylum
description: Arata Haunted Asylum is a 2D Top Down Survival horror game based on the story of a haunted asylum located in Japan. You will investigate the asylum for the proof of the paranormal.

name: Dead Second
description:
Second' bullet time reaction system with high fidelity impact physics reactions. Experience Intense shoot outs and gunplay unlike any game before it!

You're a righteous 'GUN FOR HIRE' taking care of the CORRUPT and WICKED throughout the city.​

Governments have fallen into disarray, Corporations and Private Military Contractors rule the streets.​

Take on a series of 'ASSIGNMENTS' and make them pay!​

The 'DEAD SECOND' is a bullet time reaction system. ​

Defeating an enemy activates a momentary bullet time slow motion giving you a chance to dodge incoming enemy fire. Chaining a quick succession of takedowns boosts your Score, Time & Accuracy points.

Progress through the Ranks and unlock additional Guns & Cosmetics on your way to the top of the Leaderboards.

name: Ancient Witch Arena
description: "Ancient Witch Arena" is an independently developed light survival Roguelite, hand-painted fantasy dark world. Resist hundreds of enemies, conquer bosses, explore combinations between characters and skills, and finally become the king of the arena.

name: Oil Manager
description: Who hasn't dreamed of building an oil empire? Make the dream come true.

name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4 - Road to Boruto + Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker
description: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4 - Road to Boruto + Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker is a bundle including both games.

name: NHL 23
description: NHL 23 is an ice hockey simulation video game developed by EA Vancouver and published by EA Sports. It is the 32nd instalment in the NHL video game series

name: PGA Tour 2K23: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition contains:
- The Standard Edition
- The Michael Jordan Bonus Pack
- Deluxe Bonus Pack
- Golden Club Pack, and dual-gen entitlement.

name: Aero Striker: World Invasion
description: Aero Striker is a highly stylized action-packed flight combat simulator game that is intentionally designed to be easy to make it more enjoyable and less nerve-racking. The aim is to have fun making aliens explode while experiencing the sensation of flying. Let none of the evil aliens escape!

name: The Cute Fighter
description: The universe of the game takes us to the world of anime and fantasy characters, dynamic battles, beautiful locations from cities, clubs, streets of Tokyo to the steppes of Afghanistan. The story tells us about the struggle between the world of anime and fantasy, choose your side.

name: Fortnite: Anime Legends Pack
description: Create, play, and battle with friends for free in Fortnite. Explore concerts, live events, games, and more or be the last player standing in a battle royale and zero builds.

name: Clouded VR
description: Upload your mind to the cloud and immerse yourself in a dystopian virtual holiday at the Cloud Hotel. This VR experience is a satirical commentary on our relationship with the virtual world through personal devices.

name: NASCAR: Rivals
description: NASCAR Rivals, the official video game of the 2022 season, puts the fun and intensity of the NASCAR Cup Series in the palm of your hands.

name: Dragon Ball: The Breakers - Special Edition
description:
The Special Edition includes:
- The game
- Special Edition content:
Features a set of cosmetic items that will make your survivor stand out on the battlefield! Show off your style with a complete outfit, celebrate your wins with a victory pose, and escape with character using a fun vehicle skin!
- Customizable Costume items: Souvenir Jacket (Midnight Black), Skinny Jeans (Black), Slip-On Shoes (Gray), Casual Watch (Black)
- Victory Pose "Two Handed-Good"
- Vehicle Skin "Dragon (Yellow)"

name: Daguri: Gambling Apocalypse
description: Daguri: Gambling Apocalypse is an open world gambling simulator. You must help ‘Daguri’ pay the debts he racked up during an unintended gambling spree. Roam the world, bet on gambling mini-games, and make some money!

name: The Tale of Treasonous Tom
description: The current King of Dilford in the Land of Pilfered is jolly old King Palaverous. What a putz! Using whatever means necessary, you must rise from amongst a heap of friggin' idiots to claim the throne. There are those who call you...Tom?

name: Oh Sheep!
description: Oh sheep! is a fast paced arcade game where you gather and protect sheeps from monstrous creatures for the highest score!

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Collector's Edition
description:
Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Collector's Edition includes:
- The boxed game
- The Taiko Drum Set: containing two drumsticks

name: Psychonauts 2: Motherlobe Edition
description: Razputin “Raz” Aquato, trained acrobat and powerful young psychic, has realized his lifelong dream of joining the international psychic espionage organization known as the Psychonauts! But these psychic super spies are in trouble. Their leader hasn’t been the same since he was rescued from a kidnapping, and what’s worse, there’s a mole hiding in headquarters.

name: Star Trek Prodigy: Supernova
description: After the U.S.S. Protostar picks up strange readings from a dying star, Dal and Gwyn must race against time to save their friends, their ship, and an entire planetary system before a supernova destroys them all! Using their unique skills to overcome ingenious puzzles, endure hostile environments and battle deadly robot armies, Dal and Gwyn must save their captured crewmates Jankom Pog, Rok-Tahk, Zero, and Murf. But they soon encounter a deadly new enemy, one that will stop at nothing to destroy the U.S.S. Protostar and change the very course of history!

name: Beautiful Mystic Survivors
description: Roguelite bullet-hell meets sexy anime in Beautiful Mystic Survivors, as you rise to help gorgeous heroines destroy countless invading monsters. Plan your builds, upgrade heroines, and survive against the clock. Experience polished 3D graphics, flashy VFX, and surrounded by thousands of monsters.

name: Phantom Thief Mew's Secret Prima
description: In an unexpected turn of events, Miu becomes a phantom thief. As a phantom thief, you have to carry out various mission along with her childhood friend, Chinatsu. To complete your mission,you have to sneak into the targetted location and dodge the obstacles in the way to proceed.

name: Mad Experiments 2: Escape Room
description: Mad Experiments 2: Escape Room is a multiplayer narrative escape game. Alone or with teammates, follow the story of Hildegarde and the Professor Cheshire, explore, think, and escape!

name: Icewall
description: Icewall is a game that combines retro shoot'em up and modern roguelite game design. It features intense, colorful and fast-paced gameplay, the roguelite run-based structure enhances the game with strategy and replay-value as you draft new strategies and combos.

name: Island Berry
description: Search for treasures, fish, garden and craft, help mysterious locals and fight monsters to find your way home one day.

name: Abridge
description: Abridge is an abstract, Sokoban puzzle game. Select pieces to move, pull and shift them around into a goal. The colorful shapes on them determine their movement and abilities. Remove them all from the board to solve these hand-crafted, challenging puzzles.

name: Dragon Ball: The Breakers
description: Dragon Ball: The Breakers is a 1-on-7 online asymmetrical action game in which a band of seven everyday humans tries to survive the Raider (a classic Dragon Ball rival such as Cell and Frieza) who will hunt and evolve into an unstoppable force.

name: Stella Pastoris
description: Shepherd the last remnants of the Malthusian monks marooned on Proxima Centauri B. As the colony AI, will you delve into forbidden means to save your people or allow them to go quietly into the night? Set up production chains to spend limited resources to save as many as you can.

name: Overhaul
description: Solve your way through this fast-paced rogue-lite puzzle game and outwit unforgiving creatures as you venture into the mysterious Power Plant!

name: Cloaks and Capes
description: Cloaks and Capes is an action-packed roguelite shooter with a dark theme. Inhabit Cloaker, a caster who grieves for vengeance and whose sole purpose is to resurrect his son as you engulf celestial beings in flames of anguish. Embrace powerups and spells as you pave your path through traps filled Caverns, Abysses

name: Spellbearers
description: Spellbearers is a top-down, 2D, twin stick shooter inspired by "Super Smash TV". Battle against hordes of magical enemies to liberate the rulers of three kingdoms that have been overtaken by dark forces. With staff in hand, do you have what it takes to uphold the title of The Spellbearer?

name: Venice 2089
description:
The city of Venice, once a significant tourism destination but now almost uninhabited, is struggling with the unpredictable behaviour of tides. Some of the most important monuments are being taken away, among the complaints of the citizens, and the lower part of the city becomes inaccessible more often than not.

In Venice 2089, you'll explore the city through the eyes of Nova, a bored teenager who has currently no clue about what to do in life and just wants to relax from the stress of their usual routine.

name: The Dead City
description: It's been a few months since the zombie apocalypse began.The world has fallen.The earth is inhabited by zombies, looters and small groups of survivors.

name: Memento
description: The main character Olga has lost her memory but 17 years later someone decided to make her remember who she really is. Olga woke up in an abandoned place, which turned out to have many mysteries and secrets which must be uncovered.

name: Scorn
description: Scorn is an atmospheric first person horror adventure game set in a nightmarish universe of odd forms and somber tapestry. It is designed around an idea of "being thrown into the world". Isolated and lost inside this dream-like world you will explore different interconnected regions in a non-linear fashion. The unsettling environment is a character itself. Every location contains its own theme (story), puzzles and characters that are integral in creating a cohesive lived in world. Throughout the game you will open up new areas, acquire different skill sets, weapons, various items and try to comprehend the sights presented to you.

name: Killing Floors 2: Plague Doctor Outfit Bundle
description: Comes with the Plague Doctor Outfit and Hood (includes 6 of skin styles). Compatible with most characters.

name: Jumanji: The Curse Returns - Ultimate Movie Game Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Kao The Kangaroo: Top Of The Class
description: You might not make smart moves, but at least you can dress like you do! Containing two full outfits (made up for four items) Kao can now dress with that big brain energy or mix it up to add a dash of class to an outfit, all without costing a thing!

name: Coloring Game 4: Final Pack
description: Final package for Coloring Game 4.

name: Xenoblade Chronicles 3: DLC Wave 2
description:
Challenge Battle mode against difficult enemies:
- Overcome a variety of challenges by playing the Challenge Battle mode. Collect crystals and exchange them for valuable accessories and new outfits.

A new hero character and accompanying quests:
- This wave adds the new hero character, Ino, to the game. Complete her Hero Quest to recruit her to your party and gain access to her class.

New character outfits:
- Swimsuits

name: Chunithm Sun
description: The latest version of the Sega rhythm game saga Chunithm, with new multiplayer modes, songs and gameplay enhancements.

name: Find-a-frog
description: Find all the frogs hidden in illustrations and photos submitted by froggy artists and fans!

name: OneBit Arena
description: Classic arcade gameplay for your PlayDate console

name: Gym Class: Basketball VR
description:
Gym Class is the top VR basketball simulator. Experience high-flying dunks, pickup games with friends around the world, and compete to be a star in the largest VR sports community.

With state-of-the-art physics, Gym Class makes VR basketball feel like the real thing. Use your real-life shooting, passing, and dribbling moves in the game - unlocking more creativity, and a better workout along the way.

name: My Little Pony World
description: Magic has returned to Equestria! Play as your favorite pony and explore Maretime Bay like never before! Play fun mini games, complete missions, or design and decorate the Crystal Brighthouse! Let your kindness & confidence glow bright in My Little Pony World!

name: Linia Stripes
description: Linia Stripes is the new compelling “clear the board” game. Sit down, relax and collect patterns while you discover thousands of mesmerizing colorful levels!

name: Our Fantasy Quest
description:
The adventure begins in a fantasy world!
Play your way through a variety of quests!

name: G-Mode Archives 43: Izumi Jiken File Vol. 3 - Yujuku-hen
description:
Novelist Kagamizuki Masamune was suspected of a murder case while traveling... The third installment of the full-scale mystery adventure series.

The mystery adventure "Izumi Jiken File" series is a mystery adventure game that "deduces the culprit" based on the situation at the crime scene and the information collected by interviewing.

The best-selling author "Kagamizuki Masamune" who always goes on a sudden trip, and the new editor "Izumi Kido" who is in charge of it. Three days before the deadline for the new manuscript, Izumi, who is heading to Kagamizuki's apartment, receives an email.
"It's become a big deal. I want you to help me. Please come to Kirishimayama Ryokan in Kagoshima as soon as possible."
A hot spring inn wrapped in the fresh greenery of Mt. Kirishima. There was a figure of Kagamizuki who was suspected of murder...

In the open-air bath where there was a murder case, there are employees at the entrance and "Yoshizu" around it, so it is impossible to commit the crime from the outside.

It seems that the five men who used the open-air bath were forced to wait at the inn as suspects of the incident.
At this rate, my name as a novelist will be scratched. In order to clear Kagamizuki's suspicion, Izumi challenges to solve the case.

name: Runefall 2: Collector's Edition
description:
Embark on an epic match-3 journey with your old friends from Rivermoor. The people didn’t have long to celebrate their previous victory after finding all the long-lost runes.

The Collector's Edition includes 25 extra levels, additional achievements, a strategy guide, the making of Runefall 2, a full game soundtrack, and desktop wallpapers.

name: Kao the Kangaroo: A Well Good Bundle
description: The Well Good Bundle includes the Kao The Kangaroo (2022) full game, all of the free DLC released so far (two costume packs) and the Oh Well! DLC pack for one price!

name: SnowRunner: Rezvani Hercules
description: Expand your SnowRunner garage further with the Rezvani Hercules, a high-performance 6-wheel Scout truck with a fierce and unique modern look.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Character Pack - Toyosatomimi no Miko
description: The fifth pack of additional characters is already here! Introducing "Toyosatomimi no Miko" Shoutoku Taoist! Has the ability to send out "Star Bubble" that increases spell charge!

name: Forklift Extreme: Vertigo Farm
description: Play 10 brand new levels and get special operator skin. Unique environment and challenges awaits!

name: Minion Masters: Torment
description:
The Torment DLC is a great +300% value bundle to unleash fire and fury on your enemies! including the legendary Crakgul Doomcleaver! It also gives you a headstart in this month’s Season Pass.

Includes:
- Magma Court Arena
- Volco (Master)
- Demolisher Volco Master Skin
- 3x Crakgul Doomcleaver (Legendary card)
- 5x Incubus (Supreme card)
- 20x Assassin
- 40x Magma Storm
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

Embrace your demon within with Volco, who enrages your melee Minions. Crakgul Doomcleaver strong attacks makes your Voidborne cards cheaper to play with each fresh kill, which lets you overrun your opponent with demonic horrors such as the Assassin and Incubus! The pack also includes the fiery Magma Court (custom arena) which is the perfect setting to unleash doom on your opponents!
With this DLC, you have the perfect kit to start your reign as a demonic overlord!

name: Kao the Kangaroo: Oh! Well
description: With 5 new playable Eternal Wells to conquer and 5 scary skins to unlock, Kao The Kangaroo’s Oh! Well DLC pack is the perfect way to get ready for a scare.

name: Arcade Archives: Toy Pop
description: "TOY POP" is an action game released by NAMCO （Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1986. You control PINO and ACHA, who pop out of a toy box, and collect the hearts hidden in the box (stage) to open the door and advance.

name: PGA Tour 2K23: Tiger Woods Edition
description:
The PGA TOUR 2K23 Tiger Woods Edition includes all of the content from the Deluxe Edition, including the Michael Jordan Bonus Pack, Golden Club Pack, Tiger Woods Signature Sunday Pack, and Tiger Woods Edition Bonus Pack.

PGA TOUR 2K23. More Golf. More Game.

name: QUByte Classics: Tinhead
description: Embark in an adventure to save the stars in Tinhead

name: Idle Cyber Dungeon
description: This is a Cyberpunk style role-playing game. Players don't need a lot of operations, they just need to think about some strategies to complete the victory.

name: Fragment's Note+
description: This is story that ties the future together...

name: Tits Okay Tits Fine: Need more Tits creampie
description: tits okay tits fine is a sex Simulator

name: Hunting grounds
description: Hunting grounds - Take on a fleet of space pirates as you pilot your starship in this arcade shoot'em up! Blow up enemies and collect bonuses in the vastness of the vast space and break new score records. How far can you go on this adventure?

name: ClasSimVR
description: ClasSimVR is a serious game and an exploratory platform targeted at helping pre-service teacher learn about challenging student behaviour.

name: Innocent's Purgatory
description: Innocents Purgatory is a horror themed first person RPG, melee combat the evil spirits of the purgatory, use magic to gain an advantage over your opponents, explore the purgatory to discover its secrets, 20 hours of gameplay, 4 endings.

name: Fish the Detective!
description: -A cartoonish capturing of noir fiction. -Cute n' funny dialogue. -About a half-hour of gameplay.

name: 32 in 1 Game Special
description: A tribute to those less then stellar computer shareware and multicart games of the past, 32 in 1 features many different game genres, some with a odd sense of humor. Games mainly lean on point scores ,speed runs and survival, all to give you the player a sense of pride and accomplishment!

name: Vs Chat Pack
description: Vs Chat Pack is a Twitch streamer game pack. Four games in four different genres, all focused on Twitch chat interactions. Viewers play by typing various commands in the Twitch chat, and each game allows the viewers to individually impact the streamer's game experience!

name: CyberBlocker: Complete Edition
description: It is a block breaker with a gauge type power-up system. The player's ship can always fire a shot, which, combined with the power-up system, makes it an aggressive block breaker. The difficulty level can be adjusted depending on the ship, so it can be enjoyed by both beginners and experts.

name: Loot Box Simulator: RPG Anime Girls
description: Live your life like there is no tomorrow. Earn money by finishing crazy jobs from a random selection, just to spend all of it on loot boxes. "Loot Box Simulator - RPG Anime Girls" brings pretty anime girls and exciting loot boxes to your console.

name: Deathwish
description: Trapped, Alone and long away from real world, a man must make his way through dangerous places to find a way out

name: Camp Laughter
description: A single player, low-poly horror game about escaping a killer-infested campground

name: Be My Loyal Subject
description: The reign of King Ulric begins. Help him decide how he will rule his kingdom. Between the clergy, the army, the merchants, and the common people, will he treat them fairly? Maybe he will find love in one of his followers...

name: Embers of the Zombie Battlemage: Halloween
description: Run a haunted theme park, defend it from a zombie overlord, and don't kill your co-workers in this park management/strategy RPG hybrid!

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Omoide VR - Itsuki
description: The Quintessential Quintuplets OMOIDE VR ~ITSUKI~ is the first official VR adventure game based on the popular manga series. Play as Futaro Uesugi and enjoy spending time with the youngest Quint, Itsuki, in this VR adventure game.

name: Shafted
description: Shafted is a quick resource management game. Build your mini mining colony. Optimize your mineral outputs. Strategically position your buildings with turn based tactics. Pay off your contracts or else you'll get shafted.

name: Bus Simulator City Ride
description: Take the driver’s seat as you transport passengers around a lively city in officially licensed buses from famous manufacturers: Alexander Dennis, Blue Bird, BYD, IVECO BUS, MAN, Mercedes-Benz, Scania, Setra, Volvo, and Vicinity Motor Corp. Drive the routes and complete campaign missions to unlock even more buses, districts, and routes. Climb the career ladder and establish a public transport network for your city.

name: Jumanji: The Curse Returns - Welcome to the Jungle
description: You’ve seen the movie, now become the heroes of the game. Take your place as Smolder, Mouse, Shelly and Ruby. In this new expansion, working together as a team is more important than ever! Battle Van Pelt, restore the Green Jewel and save Jumanji!

name: Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway
description: Rebuilt and re-imagined from the ground up, Nickelodeon Kart Racers returns - bigger and better than ever! Featuring a fully voice-acted cast of over 40 iconic characters, drift, slide, and boost your way to the finish line on tracks inspired by legendary Nickelodeon shows like SpongeBob SquarePants, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Avatar: The Last Airbender, and more!

name: Atama
description: Use physic powers in Atama to see through the eyes of your pursuers to avoid detection as you investigate a cursed rural Japanese village. You can't fight back; you must rely only on your powers and your wits to avoid your enemies. Inspired by Forbidden Siren and Junji Ito.

name: Atari Mania
description: A wild journey through videogame history, Atari Mania is a microgame collection wrapped in an hilarious retro-driven narrative of exploration and surprise.

name: Sunday Gold
description: Sunday Gold is a point-and-click, turn-based adventure game set in grim, dystopian future. Play as a ragtag trio of criminals to hunt down and expose the dark secrets of an evil mega-corporation and the malevolent billionaire behind it.

name: Fueled Up
description: Fueled Up is a chaotic couch co-op spaceship recovery game for up to four players. You and your crewmates must fuel, fix and rescue damaged spaceships before the evil space octopus gets its tentacles on them!

name: Dead End City
description: A post-apocalyptic arcade shooter. Collect fuel and dodge enemy fire as you fight back against the evil Scorpio gang. Mixes cars, shmups and themes that would have been right at home in 80's anime and arcades..

name: Apré Lapli
description: A chill narative adventure starring Maya and her Granpa. Defy the difficulties of the scarce environment to discover Maya's origins as they approach their destination.

name: Paradise Marsh
description: Wander through a perfect endless wetland! Catch tadpoles, enjoy peaceful sceneries and find lost poems while restoring fallen stars in the empty night sky.

name: Astlibra Revision
description: Astlibra Revision is a side scrolling 2D action RPG. It contains various reinforcement elements, exhilarating combat, rare equipment, battles with huge bosses, beautiful art, and long story. Estimated playtime: 40+ hours

name: The Case of the Golden Idol
